title: What to Put in Your Spring Forage Mix

tasks.task: Engage in a conversation about spring cover crop forage options.
subtasks: Input immersive data such as hometown zip code.
Discuss the importance of selecting appropriate species for different goals.
Select suitable legumes like spring forage peas and crimson clover.
Choose complementary grasses such as spring oats and annual rye.
Consider brassica inclusion, opting for kale and collards.
Adjust seeding rates for optimal tonnage and soil improvement.
Address potential trade-offs between seed density and costs.
Discuss timing and moisture considerations for hay inventory improvement.
